t: r/amazonprime on Reddit: Amazon logo and color change?
Amazon
s: Amazon seems to be taking our alt images, photoshopping them so that the model has darker skin and a new head - and then replacing all of the images that we uploaded with the single new image. This might not be that much of a problem if the listings were not for 4-packs of different colors.
